;Monday, November 20, 2023
; ;

;General Secretary Xi Jinping pointed out that the cultural industry and the tourism industry are inseparable, and we must persist in using culture to shape tourism and tourism to highlight culture. Promote the integrated development of culture and tourism, allowing people to appreciate the beauty of culture and cultivate the beauty of their souls while appreciating the beauty of nature.

;

;Guizhou conscientiously implements Xi Jinping’s cultural thoughts, sorts out characteristic tourism resources with wide influence, does a good job in in-depth articles, organizes and implements key construction of red culture, inheritance and promotion of national culture, research and promotion of historical culture, etc. , to accelerate the integrated development of culture and tourism.

;

;As night falls, drums are beating loudly in the Yaoshan Ancient Village Square in Libo County, and villagers perform Yao ethnic dances for tourists on the drum beats.

;

;“Ethnic dance is very popular and is a popular performance in Guzhai.” Wang Pengbo, general manager of Yaoshan Guzhai Tourism Development Co., Ltd. said, “The cultural elements rich in Yao characteristics enrich the daytime landscape tour and bring Live the night cultural tour."

;

;Enter the "Red Ribbon" Long March Cultural Digital Experience Venue in Guiyang City, and experience the bloody battle of the Xiangjiang River Battle, the great turning point of the Zunyi Conference, and the hardships of climbing snow-capped mountains and crossing grasslands. . Guiyang, a summer resort famous for its pleasant climate, has added a strong cultural identity.

;

;Use culture to shape tourism and inject culture into tourism products and scenic spots. Guizhou has deeply explored cultural resources in various places, built a number of iconic scenic spots with rich cultural heritage, enriched the humanistic connotation of natural scenic spots such as Libo Xiaoqikong, Huangguoshu Waterfall, Fanjing Mountain, and Wanfenglin, and launched 9 red cultural and tourism resource links. Integrated high-quality routes, 30 intangible cultural heritage study travel routes, and village-style tourism routes such as "Village BA" and "Village Super". This year, Guizhou also selected 30 cultural and tourism integration innovation demonstration projects and nominated demonstration projects to cultivate and expand study tours, intangible cultural heritage tours, sports tours and other industries, and strive to let good mountains and good waters tell good stories.

;

;In the Miao embroidery workshop in Huawu Village, Xinren Miao Township, Qianxi City, the embroiderers moved the needles and embroidered flowers on their fingertips to embroider colorful patterns of flowers, birds, fish and insects, which were made into plaques, Various products such as satchels and lampshades. Taking advantage of the Wujiangyuan Baili Gallery Scenic Area, the Miao embroidery in Huawu Village has gone out of the mountains. This year, the Miao embroidery workshop’s sales have reached 1.2 million yuan.

;

;“We integrate modern elements into traditional designs to make Miao embroidery patterns more fashionable, which has been recognized by consumers at home and abroad.” From opening a Miao embroidery workshop, forming a design team to inheriting handicrafts, villager Yang Wenli sees The tourism industry has given Miao embroidery new vitality.

;

;To promote culture through tourism, rely on the tourism market to activate and expand cultural resources. Guizhou has deeply promoted the development of cultural industries and cultural inheritance and innovation, strengthened the protection and inheritance of national intangible cultural heritage projects such as Miao embroidery, Miao batik, Dong songs, and Buyi eight-tone singing, and implemented the protection and inheritance of Miao embroidery, the improvement of business entities, and the industrial The park construction and other "six major projects" will be carried out, and a number of high-quality cultural and creative products will be developed and designed. In September this year, Guizhou Miao embroidery boutique clothing appeared at Milan Fashion Week in Italy, blooming in international shows.

;

;A set of data shows the strong vitality of Guizhou’s cultural and tourism integration: from January to October this year, Guizhou Province’s number of tourists, tourism revenue, and per capita consumption of tourists were 112.5% ​​and 119.6% respectively of the same period in 2019. ,106.3%.

;

;“Currently, Guizhou’s tourism industrialization is in a period of transformation and improvement of its advantages. It is necessary to make good use of the ‘two treasures’ of natural treasures and cultural treasures, exploit resources intensively, expand customer sources, upgrade services, and strive to create a world-class tourism industry. level tourist destination." said Xu Lin, Secretary of the Guizhou Provincial Party Committee.

;Monday, November 20, 2023
; ;

;The modern industrial system is the material and technological foundation of a modern country. General Secretary Xi Jinping pointed out that to build a modern industrial system, we must not only be ambitious and actively strive for development, but also be based on reality and be good at misplaced development.

;

;In the second batch of education on the theme of studying and implementing Xi Jinping Thought on Socialism with Chinese Characteristics for a New Era, all localities have effectively transformed the enthusiasm for learning and work into a powerful motivation to overcome difficulties and start a business, and strive to promote manufacturing high-quality development of the industry and accelerate the construction of a modern industrial system.

;

;;Learn work skills and vigorously develop the real economy;

;

;The value of theory lies in guiding practice, and the purpose of learning is all about application. In thematic education, all localities adhere to the two-pronged approach and promotion of education and practice, use the work skills learned to promote development, use major projects as strong engines, take advantageous industries as the main starting point, vigorously develop the real economy, and consolidate the foundation of modern industries. .

;

;The innovative traditional Chinese medicine Zhishi Total Flavonoid Tablets have been approved for marketing in China, and enzalutamide API and soft capsules have been approved for marketing abroad... In Zhanggong District, Ganzhou City, Jiangxi Province, recent developments in the field of biomedicine have Good news comes frequently. About 130 biopharmaceutical companies have gathered in the local area, forming a modern pharmaceutical and health industry cluster with active innovation, complete chains and sufficient elements.

;

;Zhanggong District will combine thematic education with the construction of a modern industrial system, strive to break the bottlenecks that restrict high-quality development, introduce a number of policies and measures to strengthen the empowerment of scientific and technological innovation, and focus on building a national key point for new drug creation. Laboratory, and established the Jiangxi Province Model Animal Industry Technology Innovation Strategic Alliance.

;

;The key to building a modern industrial system is to revitalize the manufacturing industry. In thematic education, various localities insist on taking the high-quality development of manufacturing as the main direction and transform learning results into practical measures to promote economic development.

;

;“The thinnest version of the robot we just developed can reach 127 mm, and the maximum load can reach 7 tons. It uses synchronous hydraulic lever technology and can achieve millimeter-level synchronization during the lifting process.” In Shandong At Simanke Technology Co., Ltd., technicians are conducting factory debugging on the self-developed robot. The product has been favored by the market as soon as it was launched.

;

;Jining City, Shandong Province guides party members and cadres to transform the enthusiasm inspired by thematic education into a powerful motivation for officers to start their own businesses, deepens the promotion of "cadres help enterprises climb", and vigorously promotes chain growth, cluster expansion, and square The formation rises and strives to build a modern industrial system.

;

;;Innovating development ideas and opening up new tracks for green industries;

;

;Accelerating the transformation and upgrading of traditional industries is an important support for consolidating the foundation of the modern industrial system. In thematic education, various localities guide party members and cadres to take practical actions to promote development, anchor the direction of high-end, intelligent, and green development, and comprehensively enhance the modernization level of the industrial system.

;

;“On a sunny day, you are covered with gray, and on a rainy day, you are covered with mud.” This is people’s perception of traditional cement companies. BBMG Jidong Cement Panshi Co., Ltd. has successfully created a "safe, green, innovative, smart, and efficient" five-type factory by improving the production utilization rate of cement kilns and comprehensively disposing of solid waste, straw and other waste resources.

;

;Panshi City, Jilin Province vigorously promotes the green transformation of the entire process of key industries such as cement and steel, builds an efficient, clean, low-carbon, and circular green cycle production system, and accelerates product structure adjustment, environmental protection upgrades, and intelligent manufacturing , carry out overall planning and in-depth promotion from aspects of production technology, environmental protection, energy conservation, resource utilization, etc., to transform traditional basic industries into automation, informatization, digitalization, intelligence, and green manufacturing.

;

;Building a green industrial structure with high technological content, low resource consumption and less environmental pollution has become a new growth point. In thematic education, various localities seize development opportunities and open up new tracks for green industries.

;

;When you walk into the door of Jiangsu Suqian Times Energy Storage Technology Co., Ltd., what you see is a "container", which is a megawatt-scale water-based organic flow battery that was put into production not long ago. With the support of local policies, the first phase of the production line of this high-tech enterprise has been put into operation, realizing the layout of the entire industrial chain of aqueous organic flow batteries. Suqian City focuses on new opportunities for the development of the energy storage industry, introduces policies and measures to support the development of the new energy storage industry, provides support in the transformation of enterprise achievements, technological research, and identification of high-tech enterprises, and strives to make the new energy storage industry bigger and stronger.

;

;;Solve corporate problems and help build a modern industrial system;

;

;A good business environment is the prerequisite and foundation for high-quality development and high-level opening up to the outside world. In the theme education, all localities coordinate the construction of "soft" and "hard" environments, strengthen the supply of industrial policies, improve the quality and efficiency of government services, promote the implementation of policies that benefit enterprises, and help build a modern industrial system.

;

;“We feel very comfortable with the industrial development environment in Nanchong, and a series of local policies to benefit enterprises have convinced us to settle down.” said the person in charge of Nanchong Yihui Electronic Technology Co., Ltd. At present, the company's first phase project in Nanchong has been completed and put into production, with a capacity of producing 500 million resistors per day.

;

;Taking the theme education as an opportunity, Nanchong City, Sichuan Province formulated 33 work measures to optimize and improve the business environment, starting from six aspects: stimulating the vitality of business entities, optimizing project construction services, and improving government service capabilities. Create a first-class business environment; at the same time, Nanchong City will carry out special rectification of outstanding problems in the business environment, detail 12 rectification measures in four aspects, including arrears of corporate accounts and corporate mass service card points, and clarify the leading personnel and responsible units one by one. , complete the time limit, and explore and formulate new measures and new methods to help companies bail out.

;

;In the theme education, party members and cadres from all regions are guided to go deep into the front line, understand the demands of enterprises, accurately provide services, and let the new wind of government affairs blow into the hearts of enterprises.

;

;Kenli Economic Development Zone, Dongying City, Shandong Province regards promoting deepening cooperation in the industrial chain as a key task in carrying out thematic education. It uses party building to gather enterprises in the upper, middle and lower reaches of the industrial chain to grasp projects, express demands, and Solve problems and promote development; encourage leading cadres to go deep into the park, visit enterprises, and go to the front line to understand the development of the entire industrial chain and bottlenecks that need to be solved, help enterprises solve current problems, reform and improve common policy issues, and formulate long-term development planning.

;

;Walking into Tieling Changtian Mechanical and Electrical Co., Ltd., a special professional title review meeting is being held here. The professional title review team from the human resources and social security department came to the company to review engineers on site. Since the launch of the theme education, Tieling City, Liaoning Province has continued to change its work style, improve the efficiency of government services, supervise and solve outstanding problems, and promote the continuous improvement of the city's business environment. 206 units at the city and county levels in Tieling inspected 137 government service items, solved 373 practical problems, launched 42 policy lists of "enjoy without application", and paid 21.67 million yuan of "enjoy without application" policy funds, which greatly enhanced the vitality of the market. With further stimulation, the quality and efficiency of government services have been significantly improved, and the sense of gain for enterprises and the public has been significantly enhanced.

;; Mon, 20 Nov 2023 05:26:02 +0800 01版要闻 - 从经济增长之“量”看发展之“质”（全面辩证长远看待当前经济形势·记者观察）http://paper.people.com.cn/rmrb/html/2023-11/20/nw.D110000renmrb_20231120_3-01.htm
;Monday, November 20, 2023
; ;

;To understand the general economic trend, the growth rate of gross domestic product (GDP) is an intuitive "display screen".

;

;What does every percentage point of GDP growth mean for economic development?

;

;Looking at the increase, this is a larger and stronger growth. Viewed vertically, the increment brought by 1 percentage point of my country's economic growth is equivalent to about 2.1 percentage points 10 years ago. As the scale of the economy continues to increase, my country's current annual GDP increment has far exceeded the annual GDP in the early 1990s.

;

;Looking at the weight, this is growth with a higher proportion and greater contribution. Even if the growth rate slows down, my country's GDP growth last year was still equivalent to the economic aggregate of a medium-sized country. As the second largest economy, my country's economic aggregate accounts for approximately 18% of the global economy, and has contributed more than 30% to world economic growth for many consecutive years.

;

;Looking at quality, this is growth with less energy consumption and stronger innovation. Energy consumption per unit of GDP dropped by 26.4%, water consumption per unit of GDP dropped by 45%, and carbon dioxide emissions per unit of GDP dropped by 34.4%... From 2012 to 2021, my country's average annual energy consumption growth rate of 3% supported an average economic growth of 6.6% , becoming one of the countries with the fastest reduction in energy intensity in the world. At the same time, my country’s ranking rose to 11th in the Global Innovation Index, successfully entering the ranks of innovative countries.

;

;Since the beginning of this year, my country's economy has continued to recover and has made solid progress in high-quality development. The economic growth rate of 5.2% in the first three quarters ranks among the best among major international economies. However, short-term fluctuations in some economic indicators have caused some people to worry about the prospects of my country's economic development, including various arguments that "speak negatively" of China.

;

;Understanding the general trend of my country's economy, the increase or decrease in economic indicators is important, but we cannot be led by the fluctuations of short-term indicators. We must have historical patience and strategic determination, maintain confidence and a normal mind, and use a comprehensive To look at problems from a dialectical and long-term perspective, we must not only look at the short-term "shape", but also the long-term "potential", not only the "quantity" of growth, but also the "quality" of development. Through one percentage point With GDP growth, we can see clearly the general logic of high-quality economic development in our country.

;

;The high-quality development of our country’s economy is a development with higher gold content.

;

;When observing economic development, we need to know not only what is happening but also why. At present, our country's economy is in a critical period of transforming development concepts, optimizing economic structure, and transforming growth momentum. What is more important than growth rate is the improvement of development quality and the conversion of old and new driving forces. Since the beginning of this year, our country's economy has continued to gain advantages and take the initiative in structural adjustment, transformation and upgrading. From January to October, the total retail sales of consumer goods increased by 6.9%, the retail sales of services increased by 19.0%, the added value of industries above designated size increased by 4.1%, and the service industry production index increased by 7.9%... Stronger power, better structure, and higher efficiency Economic growth continues to enhance the value of economic development. With the recent intensive implementation of consumption-promoting measures by the National Development and Reform Commission and other departments, the "main engine" of consumption will continue to increase.

;

;The high-quality development of our country’s economy is a development with stronger driving force.

;

;Throughout the history of world economics, countries that have successfully transformed into high-income economies have all relied on continuous innovation to improve the quality of development and complete the transition from a factor-driven development model to an innovation-driven development model. of successful conversion. In recent years, the innovation-driven development strategy has been implemented in depth, making every percentage point of my country's economic growth more technologically intensive. The "three new" economy, with new industries, new formats, and new business models as the main content, is growing rapidly. In 2022, the added value will exceed 20 trillion yuan for the first time, accounting for 17.36% of GDP. From January to October this year, investment in high-tech industries increased by 11.1% year-on-year. The "first driving force" of innovation has become increasingly strong, promoting the economy to achieve steady and long-term development on the road of high-quality development.

;

;my country’s high-quality economic development is a development that brings a greater sense of gain.

;

;Enhancing people's livelihood and well-being is the fundamental purpose of development. International experience shows that the employment-driven efficiency of the tertiary industry is about 20% higher than that of the secondary industry. As the proportion of the service industry in GDP has steadily increased, my country's current GDP growth of 1 percentage point can create about 2 million new jobs.

;

;Since the beginning of this year, the service industry, especially the contact-based cluster service industry, has recovered relatively quickly, and its role in promoting employment has been significantly enhanced. From January to September, 10.22 million new jobs were created in cities and towns across the country, completing 85% of the full-year target. At present, the booming development of emerging industries has given rise to new occupational needs such as Internet of Things engineering technicians and big data engineering technicians, which will effectively expand employment space. The stable employment base has laid a solid foundation and created good conditions for achieving common prosperity in high-quality development. In the first three quarters, the per capita disposable income of national residents actually increased by 5.9% year-on-year, which is faster than the GDP growth rate.

;

;“The deeper you go, the harder it is to get in.” Today, national rejuvenation has entered a critical stage, the journey of Chinese-style modernization is more ambitious, and time is more pressing. We must clearly realize that the larger the economy, the higher the quality, and the less energy consumption, the higher the requirements and difficulty of development. This also means that a GDP growth of 1 percentage point requires us to make more efforts and meet greater challenges.

;

;“On our new journey, our future is bright, but the road ahead will not be smooth sailing.” General Secretary Xi Jinping’s sonorous words are inspiring and inspiring. Looking forward to the future, my country's economic development has a long way to go. We must continue to climb over obstacles and overcome difficulties with the persistence of never letting go of the green hills and the sobriety of walking a hundred miles. New greatness.

; Mon, 20 Nov 2023 05:26:02 +0800 01版要闻 - 河北唐山着力推进产业转型升级http://paper.people.com.cn/rmrb/html/2023-11/20/nw.D110000renmrb_20231120_4-01.htm
;Monday, November 20, 2023
; ;

;Recently, the HBIS-Posco Automobile Sheet Joint Venture project was put into production in Tangshan City, Hebei Province, becoming an important step for Tangshan to accelerate industrial transformation and upgrading. Another sign. Focusing on ultra-thin gauge steel and high-grade automotive sheets for new energy vehicles, the project’s featured zinc-iron alloy products are only 0.3 mm thinnest and can reach a maximum strength of 980 MPa.

;

;Built for coal and prospering for steel, Tangshan is a century-old industrial city. In July 2016, General Secretary Xi Jinping inspected Tangshan and hoped that Tangshan would "strive to be at the forefront in transforming development methods, adjusting economic structure, and promoting supply-side structural reforms."

;

;The cadres and masses in Tangshan have kept in mind General Secretary Xi Jinping’s earnest instructions, strived to promote industrial transformation and upgrading, and accelerated the construction of a modern industrial system supported by high-quality steel, high-end equipment manufacturing, new energy and other industries.

;

;In 2022, Tangshan City’s industrial added value will be 450.01 billion yuan, an increase of 4.9% compared with 2021 and an increase of 33.6% compared with 2016. In the first three quarters of this year, Tangshan achieved a regional GDP of 653.78 billion yuan, a year-on-year increase of 5.4%.

;

;;Upgrading the steel industry;

;

;In 30 minutes, through the intelligent system, a furnace of steel can be produced; in 90 seconds, through the intelligent hot rolling production line , that is, it can produce a coil of steel... Walking into the intelligent production workshop of Tangshan Iron and Steel Company of Hegang Group, a modern atmosphere hits your face.

;

;"Resolutely remove, proactively adjust, and accelerate transformation", Tangshan has made great efforts in recent years to promote the high-end, intelligent, and green development of the steel industry, and accelerate the transformation from a "big steel city" to a "strong steel city."

;

;Lead the high-quality development of the steel industry with technological innovation. The Hebei Provincial Iron and Steel Laboratory has settled in Tangshan, hiring experts and academicians to carry out technical research in eight main research directions. At present, the city has promoted steel companies to establish 12 provincial-level scientific research platforms and 8 municipal-level scientific research platforms. The proportion of high value-added steel products in the city has increased from 16.12% in 2016 to 40% now.

;

;Optimize the layout of steel enterprises and promote cost reduction and efficiency improvement. Lang Wenchang, director of the Tangshan Municipal Development and Reform Commission, said that through vigorous implementation of steel company relocation, mergers and reorganizations, the number of Tangshan steel companies has reduced from 44 in 2016 to 20. All 11 steel companies in and around the city have been relocated, and the proportion of steel production capacity in the Lingang area has increased from 13.2% before the relocation to 38.6%. The city has built 7 new steel enterprise railway lines to achieve full coverage of non-Lingang steel enterprise railways.

;

;“After Tangshan Iron and Steel moved from the city’s main urban area to the coastal area of ​​Laoting, it is 1.4 kilometers away from the port, and the transportation cost per ton of steel has been reduced by about 160 yuan.” said Wang Lei, deputy director of Tangshan Iron and Steel Development and Planning Department.

;

;;The equipment manufacturing industry continues to grow;

;

;In recent years, Tangshan has continued to cultivate and expand the high-end equipment manufacturing industry. At present, there are more than 110 high-end equipment manufacturing companies in the city with operating income exceeding 100 million yuan. The high-end equipment manufacturing industry has developed into the second largest leading industry after the high-quality steel industry.

;

;Coffee-making robots, orbital intelligent inspection robots... 132 products and parts from 50 robot-related companies were displayed at the Tangshan High-tech Zone Robot Exhibition and Experience Center. Gao Limin, deputy secretary of the Party Working Committee of the High-tech Zone, said that in the first half of this year, the robot industry in the district achieved revenue of 3.19 billion yuan, a year-on-year increase of 21.6%.

;

;“This newly developed steel inspection robot can detect the outline dimensions, curvature and torsion of dozens of steel profiles, rods and wires. Compared with manual sampling measurement, robot inspection It has achieved simultaneous inspection and 100% inspection, and the measurement accuracy is controlled within 0.05 mm." Yuan Hao, general manager of Hebei Eagle Eye Intelligent Technology Co., Ltd., said that the company will achieve revenue of 22.88 million yuan in 2022, a year-on-year increase of 101.76%.

;

;Eagle Eye Intelligence is a local robotics company incubated in Tangshan. "We have cooperated with Tangshan High-tech Zone to establish the province's first professional robot innovation and entrepreneurship platform - the National Torch Tangshan Robot Characteristic Industry Base Incubation Center, providing design and R&D, manufacturing, material procurement, marketing and other service platforms for settled enterprises." Tangshan Wang Mengzhao, deputy general manager of Tangshan Baichuan Intelligent Machine Co., Ltd., a leading robotics company, said that there are currently more than 230 companies in the incubation center, and more than 20 robotics companies have been successfully incubated.

;

;Exploring the "leading enterprise + incubation" model, Tangshan has accelerated the cluster development of high-end equipment manufacturing industries. At present, it has formed high-tech zone robots, Fengrun District rail transit equipment, Yutian County printing and packaging machinery, Kaiping District emergency equipment, etc. A characteristic industrial cluster. In the field of robotics, more than 100 industry chain-related companies have gathered, centered on several leading companies.

;

;Seizing the opportunity of coordinated development in Beijing, Tianjin and Hebei, Tangshan promotes technological collaboration between local industries and Beijing and Tianjin. In the field of robots, Tangshan has cooperated with the Zhongguancun Robot Industry Innovation Center to establish a Hebei branch center and built a key technology research and development and pilot test base in the Tangshan High-tech Zone to introduce innovation and vitality to industrial development.

;

;In the implementation of the "Robot+" application action, Tangshan sorted out 86 products and system solutions for robot application scenarios in traditional industries such as iron and steel metallurgy, shipbuilding, petrochemicals, etc., and organized special supply and demand matchmaking meetings to promote . “In addition to the Eagle Eye intelligent inspection robot used in the Tangshan steel industry, more than 50 special robots developed by CITIC Heavy Industry Kaicheng Company are widely used in emergency rescue, smart mines, etc., and Haisen Electronics’ ridge walking robot is used in agricultural irrigation. It saves 40% of water and 35% of electricity," said Meng Xiangyin, director of Tangshan City Industry and Information Technology Bureau.

;

;In 2022, the number of high-end equipment manufacturing enterprises above designated size in Tangshan will reach 769, achieving operating income of 168.62 billion yuan, accounting for 11.4% of the city's above-scale industries.

;

;;The new energy industry is developing rapidly;

;

;Hu Zhiqiang, a driver of a fuel-fired heavy truck for 18 years, has switched from a gas station to a new one since October last year. Supply station - a hydrogenation station located in the North District of Hebei Yanshan Iron and Steel Group. "In 15 minutes, 32 kilograms of hydrogen can be added, enough to run 360 kilometers."

;

;As a heavy industrial city, Tangshan produces a large amount of coal and other raw materials every day Products such as steel and heavy equipment travel between production companies and ports, and transportation mainly relies on heavy trucks.

;

;"Hydrogen heavy trucks cost about 2.5 yuan per kilometer, which is 0.5 yuan cheaper than fuel. The group has 41 vehicles and can save more than 2 million yuan a year. Moreover, hydrogen heavy trucks only emit water, which solves the problem Environmental issues." Zhao Xia, director of the new energy business department of Yanshan Iron and Steel Group, said, "Before the end of this year, the group will also have 50 hydrogen-powered heavy-duty trucks put into use."

;

;Data shows that Tangshan currently has 50 hydrogen-powered heavy-duty trucks. The number of vehicles is 9,190, ranking among the top among prefecture-level cities in the country. Among them, 2,735 new energy heavy trucks will be added in 2021, and 3,923 new vehicles will be added in 2022. The growth rate is also among the highest in the country.

;

;The rapid growth in the number of new energy heavy trucks in Tangshan is closely related to the rapidly growing local new energy industry. In the past two years, Tangshan has intensively introduced plans and implementation plans for the development of new energy industries such as hydrogen energy and photovoltaics, and established a multi-energy complementary new energy pattern of "wind, solar, water, fire, hydrogen storage and ammonia".

;

;In June this year, Zhongrong Technology’s 10,000 standard cubic meters/hour battery fuel hydrogen project, the country’s largest iron and steel industry (coking) tail gas fuel hydrogen production project, was put into operation in Tangshan. The project has an annual output of 7,200 tons of hydrogen for fuel cells, which can meet the needs of 700 fuel cell heavy-duty trucks and other fuel cell vehicles every day. In addition, a large number of key new energy projects have been accelerated in Tangshan.

;

;Develop new energy industries and build a green industrial system. In addition to relying on new energy heavy trucks to build an industrial "green transportation" system, Tangshan has also accelerated the implementation of the "green steel" plan and promoted the city's 20 steel companies to build distributed photovoltaic power generation of 109,900 kilowatts, with 37,400 kilowatts under construction.

;

;"At present, Tangshan's annual green power production capacity is 4.1 billion kilowatt-hours and its annual automotive hydrogen production capacity is 9,000 tons, which can help reduce carbon emissions by 1.32 million tons. It is expected that by 2025, Tangshan City will have an annual production capacity of 9,000 tons. 8 billion kilowatt-hours of green power and 28,000 tons of hydrogen for vehicles have helped reduce carbon emissions by 2.76 million tons, making Tangshan's contribution to achieving carbon peak and carbon neutrality goals and accelerating its own high-quality development." said Wu Weidong, Secretary of the Tangshan Municipal Party Committee.

; ;

;;
;

;The picture shows the inspection vehicle passing through Shangri-La Xiaozhongdian Station nearby.
;Photographed by Chen Chang (Photo China)

;
; ;

;On the morning of November 15th, a list of updates The inspection vehicle slowly drove out from Lijiang Station in Yunnan, passing through Jade Dragon Snow Mountain, Tiger Leaping Gorge, and Haba Snow Mountain, and headed for Shangri-La Station at an altitude of 3,200 meters.

;

;"Dynamic inspection is a comprehensive 'physical examination' of the overall project construction quality of the line, marking that the Lixiang section of the Yunnan-Tibet Railway has entered a critical stage of project acceptance, and the countdown has entered into the opening of the entire line." China Railway Kunming Bureau Chen Yingwu, deputy commander of the West Yunnan Railway Construction Headquarters, could not hide his excitement, "We will be able to take the train to the beautiful Shangri-La!"

;

;The Lixiang section of the Yunnan-Tibet Railway connects Lijiang City in Yunnan Province with Di Qing Tibetan Autonomous Prefecture is an important part of the Yunnan-Tibet Railway in my country's medium- and long-term railway network planning, with a total length of 139.7 kilometers. Construction of the railway started in 2014. Thanks to the unremitting efforts of more than 20,000 builders over a period of nine years, it will be put into operation in the near future.

;

;;Overcoming Snow Mountain Tunnel Construction Difficulties;

;

;The Lixiang Section of the Yunnan-Tibet Railway is located in the northwest of Yunnan Province, the southeastern edge of the Qinghai-Tibet Plateau, and the middle section of the Hengduan Mountains. Mountains and ridges are connected by bridges and tunnels - 34 new bridges and 20 tunnels have been built across the entire line, with the bridge-to-tunnel ratio as high as 73.4%.

;

;Large deformation of soft rock, high ground stress, high temperature and abundant water...the geological conditions along the line are complex, posing considerable challenges to construction. Among them, the most difficult tunnel to construct is the Haba Snow Mountain Tunnel.

;

;The Haba Snow Mountain Tunnel, with a total length of 9,523 meters, is a Class I high-risk tunnel and is a key and difficult control project along the entire line. "A tunnel like this that combines ultra-large burial depth, high ground stress and large deformation of soft rock is rare in China." The Lixiang Section Project Management Department of the China Railway 16th Bureau Yunnan-Tibet Railway undertook the construction of the Haba Snow Mountain Tunnel (hereinafter referred to as the "Lixiang Section Project" Department") Deputy Manager Liu Zhenwei said.

;

;In the display cabinet of the Haba Snow Mountain Tunnel Project Department, a row of deformed steel plates caught the reporter's attention. After experiencing huge external force tearing, the steel plate was shattered. What kind of force is this? Liu Zhenwei explained: "The maximum burial depth of the Haba Snow Mountain Tunnel is 1,155 meters. The ground stress is too strong, which is equivalent to the water pressure of 237 meters in the deep sea." Generally speaking, the allowable contact pressure of the tunnel's initial support and secondary lining steel plate is 0.5 MPa. , approximately equal to the pressure 50 meters underwater. However, the measured contact stress during the construction phase of the Haba Snow Mountain Tunnel reached 2.37 MPa, which is nearly five times the maximum allowable contact stress in the design.

;

;When constructed under such strong ground stress, the tunnel is prone to dangers such as surrounding rock collapse and support deformation. One day in April 2021, the construction team encountered a sudden danger in the tunnel: "Gretting operations were being carried out at the time, and fine powder suddenly fell from the surrounding rocks around the tunnel face. We evacuated the site urgently." Liu Zhenwei said, in less than 2 minutes , the surrounding rock collapsed, and the spurting surrounding rock pushed the gunite machine weighing several hundred kilograms out more than ten meters. Recalling the shocking moment, Liu Zhenwei still has lingering fears.

;

;Driving, collapsing, and digging again... the builders struggled repeatedly with the surrounding rocks. In order to overcome the construction difficulties, the participating units invited experts to go deep into the tunnel to "check the pulse" and formed a set of technical measures of "first release, then resistance, and combination of resistance". "First dig a middle guide tunnel at the main tunnel position to release part of the ground stress, then expand the middle guide tunnel, and strengthen the support during the expansion process." Liu Zhenwei said that general tunnel support only requires a lining. Ichigo, but the Haba Snow Mountain Tunnel uses a lining of three protectors to offset ground stress.

;

;On July 8 this year, the Haba Snow Mountain Tunnel was finally completed. Li Decheng, the laboratory director of the Lixiang Section Project Department, who had retired last October: "This is the last tunnel built in my career and the most difficult tunnel. Now I can rest assured to retire!"

;

; ; Steel long dragons complement each other with green mountains and green mountains ;

;

; There are multiple scenic spots and nature reserves along the Liliang Section of the Yunnan -Tibet Railway, accompanied by the green mountains and green mountains. Because it is located in high altitude areas, the ecological environment is very fragile.

;

; In order to reduce the impact of construction on the ecology along the line, the participating parties adhere to the concept of green development and adhere to environmental protection and soil and water conservation.

;

; About 40 meters from the import of Haba Snow Mountain Tunnel, the reporter saw a sewage treatment station covering more than 400 square meters. A stout pipeline was revealed from the tunnel and connected to the front sedimentation tank of the sewage treatment station. The tunnel pouring water and construction wastewater are for the first time, filtering particulate matter such as gravel and sediment, and then enter the sewage treatment station. The water after treatment must be settled by the end -at three levels of sewage sedimentation tanks.

;

; "The Import of the Haba Snow Mountain Tunnel is located in the Tiger Jumping Gorge Tourist Scenic Area and the Jinsha River Water Source Reserve. Before starting the start, we built this sewage treatment station." Diao Feng, the person in charge of the leadership group, told reporters that the processed wastewater was then used for water reduction in the construction site, mixing and stations and other areas, which was used in the work area.

;

; The recycling of wastewater is used, and the waste soil abandon slag is concentrated and unified. The Lixiang section Jinsha River Special Bridge on both sides of the Jinsha River is the Harba Snow Mountain and Yulong Snow Mountain Nature Reserve. The bridge inheritance is far from the environmental sensitive area when the site is selected from the Sakura Bridge Bureau. , Dip the surface soil as much as possible, and then abandon the soil from low to high. After the residue is completed, according to the re -reclamation plan, the divestitudes are used to re -green with the divestitudes of the soil.

;

; "Every time in the rain, we will arrange a special person to inspect the hidden dangers of environmental risks such as abandoning residue fields, mixing and stations, and check if there is a ditch to block or the slope collapse and cause water and soil loss." The China Railway Bridge Bureau Jinsha Bureau Wu Xiaoguan, head of the Jiangte Bridge project department, said.

;

; According to reports, the Liliang Section of the Yunnan -Tibet Railway has built a total of 8 sewage treatment stations, built more than 40 sedimentation tanks, about 105,000 cubic meters of protection facilities, and about 187,000 square meters of green planting , Spread out the harmonious scroll of the steel long dragon and the green mountains and green mountains.

;

; ; Fill the gap in the road network and promote the development of the route ;

;

; After the Lixiang section of the Yunnan -Tibet Railway is opened to traffic, the Diqing Tibetan Autonomous Prefecture will end the history of the railway. This will fill the gap in the railway network in northwestern Yunnan, improve the traffic pattern in the region, and promote the high -quality development of the economy and society along the route.

;

; For tourists in Lijiang and Diqing, the railway is about to open up is an exciting news. The train crosses the Jinsha River north, via Xiaodian to Shangri -La, and passes through famous scenic spots such as Yulong Snow Mountain, Tiger Jumping Gorge, Haba Snow Mountain, and crosses the regions to gather places such as Tibetan, Yi, and Bai.

;

; Duan Shuying, a villager in Hujuexia Town, Shangri -La, is looking forward to the opening of the railway. In August of this year, her farmhouses were put into use in the renovation. After the expansion, there were 30 guest rooms, and 20 boardwatch tourists can be received. "My family is only more than 20 kilometers from the Tiger Jumping Gorge Scenic Area. After the railway is opened to traffic, it can bring more tourists, and the business will definitely be more popular." Duan Shuying said.

;

; He Lan, the person in charge of the Xinyunling Travel Agency, Lijiang City, has always paid attention to the progress of railway construction. In the past, it could only take a car from Lijiang to Shangri -La. The rainy season was not good, and it took more than 3 hours. After the opening of the railway, the two places have greatly increased, and the number of tourists is expected to increase significantly. He Lan believes that from the long run, the railway will connect the area into a "big scenic spot" to promote the development of tourism in western Yunnan.

;

; The opening of the Lixiang section of the Yunnan -Tibet Railway is of great significance to drive the industrial development of the region along the route and promote rural revitalization.

;

; Talking about the topic of the railway is about to open to traffic, Zhuomaram, the head of Shangri -La Plateau Craft Craft Beer Co., Ltd., said: "Now our packaging materials come in through highway freight, encounter rain and snow weather, roads, highways, highways The unstable transportation will affect the production of enterprises. Railway freight is more secure, stable, and efficient. Our green beer can also move towards a wider market. "

;

; According to Shangri -La Customs, from January to September this year, Di The total value of Qing Dynasty was 26.17 million yuan, and the export products were mainly characteristic agricultural products such as Qingya Beer, Matsutake, Berobacteria, and wine.

;

; "The Liliang section of the Yunnan -Tibet Railway is integrated into my country's developed transportation network, which will be in line with international channels such as the Chinese and Lao Lao Railway and the Western Luhai New Channel. There will be more markets that are in a wider market for the plateau. "

; The Central Propaganda Department, the Central Spiritual Civilization Construction Office, the National Federation of Trade Unions, the Communist Youth League Central Committee, the National Women's Federation, and the Central Military Commission's Political Work Department.

; 4. Implementation steps

;

; 1. Movement of mass recommendations.
